channel.title: [Help] How Can I Add Xp To A Player When They Login?
channel.description:
Ok, I was wondering how i could add xp to a player when they login.
I want to make them have 85 slayer when they login. And how can i change the starter items, say like i start with 2m how can i change to like 1m?
Regards, James

item.title: [Help] How Can I Add Xp To A Player When They Login?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

on the login method; usually in player class (if however it aint there try client class.)

addSkillXP(XP, 18);

for the starter cash its located in client class; search for some of the items you get and you will see (if however it aint there try player class.)

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] How Can I Add Xp To A Player When They Login?
